com.advantech.bleeplib.utils

Class BLETaskHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.advantech.bleeplib.utils.BLETaskHandler

  • public class BLETaskHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    BLETaskHandler is an ready-to-use handler class that can assist user to do batch tasks for transmit image or firmware upgrade for more than one Advantech EPD devices at the same time. This handler will execute the sequential tasks one after one. These tasks including connecting to the EPD device, sending image/upgrading firmware patch, reporting the task status and progress, and disconnecting the EPD device after the job was done. This handler also implements the function for at most 5 times retry if device is disconnected when sending the task. connection timeout is set to 20 seconds and task timeout is set to 60 seconds to address the problems about no response from EPD devices. We highly recommend to use this handler if you have more than one jobs need to done for bulk of devices.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Fabian Chung

    • Method Detail

      • startTask

        public boolean startTask(TaskType taskType,
                         byte[] packageData,
                         java.lang.String firmwareVersion,
                         boolean autoDisconnect)
        Start a task for firmware upgrade using this BLETaskHandler object.
        Parameters:
        taskType - task type, must be TaskType.FIRMWARE_UPGRADE
        packageData - package data in the byte array format
        firmwareVersion - firmware version
        autoDisconnect - true disconnect the device after the task is done; false remain the connection after the task is done
        Returns:
        true send this command successfully; false an existing task is still running or device in the waiting queue

      • startTask

        public boolean startTask(TaskType taskType,
                         PanelType panelType,
                         android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                         int page,
                         int action,
                         boolean autoDisconnect)
        Start a task for pushing image using this BLETaskHandler object.
        Parameters:
        taskType - task type, must be TaskType.PUSH_IMAGE
        panelType - EPD panel-type PanelType
        image - image in the bitmap format which is ready to transmit; please resize image size to fit each EPD panel-type PanelType
        page - which page number you want to transmit image on the EPD device; this number must be larger than 0
        action - refresh this image immediately 1 or not 0
        autoDisconnect - true disconnect the device after the task is done; false remain the connection after the task is done
        Returns:
        true send this command successfully; false an existing task is still running or device in the waiting queue

      • startTask

        public boolean startTask(TaskType taskType,
                         boolean autoDisconnect)
        Start a task for check status using this BLETaskHandler object.
        Parameters:
        taskType - task type, must be TaskType.CHECK_STATUS
        autoDisconnect - true disconnect the device after the task is done; false remain the connection after the task is done
        Returns:
        true send this command successfully; false an existing task is still running or device in the waiting queue

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Terminate the task and disconnect the device.
